name: MELLON FINANCIAL SERVICES CORPORATE #1 (FORMERLY BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORP.)
sampleDescriptions: Implementation of the "Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act," including provisions affecting custody banking; H.R. 2121, the "Pension, Endowment, and Mutual Fund Access to Banking Act;" and S. 2155, the "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act."

Legislation and regulation affecting custody banking, including H.R. 2121, the "Pension, Endowment, and Mutual Fund Access to Banking Act;" and S. 2155, the "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act."
Legislation and regulation affecting custody banking, including implementation of S. 2155, the "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act."
Legislation and regulation affecting custody banking, including implementation of S.2155, the "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act."

Legislation and regulation affecting custody banking, including implementation of S.2155, the "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act," electronic notarization and delivery of documents, S.3533 and H.R.6364, the "Securing and Enabling Commerce Using Remote and Electronic Notarization Act of 2020."
Legislation and regulation affecting custody banking.
